name: Curtis X. THOMAS, Appellant, v. Martin HORN, Secretary, Department of Corrections, Appellee

parties: Curtis X. THOMAS, Appellant, v. Martin HORN, Secretary, Department of Corrections, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 18th day of May, 2000, probable jurisdiction is herewith noted and the order of Commonwealth Court is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
751 A.2d 181
Curtis X. THOMAS, Appellant, v. Martin HORN, Secretary, Department of Corrections, Appellee.
No. 22 M.D. Appeal Docket 2000.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 18, 2000.
